title: 关于插件emeraldmarket的语言改变方法的问题（80金币！）
author: Greensky
txt_content:
本帖最后由 henry5041 于 2013-12-2 23:16 编辑 

我使用了一个名为emeraldmarket的插件，这款插件可能很少人知道 原帖：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/emeraldmarket/
那上面可以设置语言，预设的语言里没有中文，但可以设置自定义语言，自己编写语言文件。我使用的是ultra edit，语言格式是utf-8，但不知道为什么编完以后报错。错误代码：
23:11:27 [INFO] [EmeraldMarket] Enabling EmeraldMarket v3.7
23:11:27 [SEVERE] Cannot load plugins\EmeraldMarket\language.yml
23:11:27 org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
23:11:27 in "<string>", position 18
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadFromString(YamlConfiguration.java:55)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration.load(FileConfiguration.java:138)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration.load(FileConfiguration.java:105)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadConfiguration(YamlConfiguration.java:175)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.ConfigAccessor.reloadConfig(ConfigAccessor.java:34)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.ConfigAccessor.getConfig(ConfigAccessor.java:46)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.Language.loadLanguage(Language.java:465)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.Language.lang_customizable(Language.java:375)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.EmeraldMarket.getLang(EmeraldMarket.java:651)
23:11:27 at ch.dragon252525.emeraldMarket.EmeraldMarket.onEnable(EmeraldMarket.java:79)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:217)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:457)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:381)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:282)
23:11:27 at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:264)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.MinecraftServer.l(MinecraftServer.java:313)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.MinecraftServer.f(MinecraftServer.java:290)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:250)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:151)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:391)
23:11:27 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:582)
23:11:28 Caused by: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
23:11:28 in "<string>", position 18
23:11:28 at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.checkPrintable(StreamReader.java:70)
23:11:28 at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.<init>(StreamReader.java:50)
23:11:28 at org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.load(Yaml.java:399)
23:11:28 at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadFromString(YamlConfiguration.java:53)
复制代码

为什么有问题？难道是格式不对？80枚金币求帮助啊，你去试试这个插件也行

replies.author: 尘曲
replies.txt_content:
henry5041 发表于 2013-12-3 23:17 
ANSI好像不行。。
第十八行的空格= =

replies.author: 灰机rp
replies.txt_content:
{:10_566:}英语根本看不懂啊= =
你可以找汉化教程的啊
论坛上有的啊= =
你可以慢慢汉化

replies.author: 尘曲
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2013-12-2 23:53 
转成UTF-8无BOM。
 = = 应该是转成ansi吧，大多数插件都是调用bukkit提供的方法处理文件，所以编码问题一直都有。。。

replies.author: Greensky
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 henry5041 于 2013-12-3 23:16 编辑

转成UTF-8无BOM。
额，我已经试了这个in "<string>", position 18
